name: Bomb Time (GamesPrinter)
description:
Game Made for a One Minute Jam. since the submission period hasn't ended, maybe i'll still modify the game, i still don't feel it's ok, suggestions are welcome.

the game was made in Unity, and the 3D models in Blender. immediately when I read the JAM rules, what came to my mind was a bomb.

Controls:

Left Click - Pick Up/Use

Right Click - Drop

R - Restart

Credits:

3D art - Lucas Dutra

Programmer - Lucas Dutra
